description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(38).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,74,0,-1).
formula: G.f.: -(x^3-6*x^2-37*x-6) / (x^4-74*x^2+1). - _Colin Barker_, Nov 04 2013From _Gerry Martens_, Jul 11 2015: (start)Interspersion of 2 sequences [a0(n),a1(n)] for n>0:a0(n) = (-3+sqrt(19/2))*(37+6*sqrt(38))^n-(6+sqrt(38))/(2*(37+6*sqrt(38))^n).a1(n) = (1/(37+6*sqrt(38))^n+(37+6*sqrt(38))^n)/2. (End)
mathematica: Table[Numerator[FromContinuedFraction[ContinuedFraction[Sqrt[38],n]]],{n,1,50}] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Mar 21 2011*)Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[38], 30]] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 29 2013 *)a0[n_] := (-3+Sqrt[19/2])*(37+6*Sqrt[38])^n-(6+Sqrt[38])/(2*(37+6*Sqrt[38])^n) // Simplifya1[n_] := (1/(37+6*Sqrt[38])^n+(37+6*Sqrt[38])^n)/2 // FullSimplifyFlatten[MapIndexed[{a0[#], a1[#]}&, Range[20]]] (* _Gerry Martens_, Jul 11 2015 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
